评论详情: I'm by no means an XL but this XL runs pretty small.  Other than that, it's fine.  Comfortable and soft.  It's very form fitting, which is bad for my big gut.
I'm an Animal House fan, this t-shirt is great!

评论概述: Screen printing cracked and faded after one wash
评论详情: I washed the shirt before wearing it. Screen printing cracked and the “E” was faded after the wash. Never wore the item. I returned the shirt.

评论概述: wore once washed and wording already coming off
评论详情: i wore the shirt once washed it and lettering is coming off
The material was ok. College sign faded after one wash.

评论概述: washed it and it says “ollege” now
评论详情: pros: this shirt is comfy & funny. fits true to size. i washed it w no visual issues, and wore it to work for school spirit day. got a lot of laughs. but once i washed it the second time the C literally washed off. if i didnt follow basic laundry hygiene or i wanted a t-shirt that said ollege, it’d be five stars. too bad. oh well, ill still use it for hair-dyeing day.
Very cool shirt for Belushi fans.

This shirt is an absolute piece of garbage.  Zero stars!!!  I wore the shirt once, and washed and dried it like any other normal t-shirt.  When I pulled it out of the dryer, I found that the stitching had come completely out of the bottom of the shirt.  There was not one bit of stitching left in the bottom of the shirt.  Do yourself a favor and avoid this shirt at all costs.
I did not go to college but everyone now thinks that I did. It’s a hard gig to pull of but I pulled in my inner John Belushi and I got it done.

评论概述: You gotta laugh a little now and then...
评论详情: Did the trick - I was viewed as the snarkiest teacher in the school on Collegiate Wear spirit day!

Got this for my sister. As a H.S. senior, they can wear their prospective college shirt on Fridays. My sister doesn't know which one she wants to go to so she begged me to get this for her to wear. Her teachers got a kick out of it and her classmates thought she was weird; that's my girl!
Product was as expected. No suprises. Nice.
Perfect for my senior
Great shirt. Perfect for college Monday where I teach.
Terrible. The letters started coming off after the first wash, I had not even worn it once, too bad. Don't buy.
My kids love it
Fit well. Great material.

Can get hot. Fits expectations.
Fits normal. Wore around TCU, only professors commented on the shirt. Sad!
Got if for a friend who just finished grad school. She loved it!
son loved this shirt. fits as expected.

Fits perfectly.
